post.author: 김성욱

comment.author: 신민용
comment.content: I got the same email today, and I don't know who Brian is.

post.content:
Hi Brendan,
Java Developer - ONE YEAR contract opportunity - Mississauaga
Please review the position description below and reply back with a resume that I can review if you feel you are qualified and available. The rate for this position is 60.00 per hour
Fortune 500 company, voted one of Canada's best to work for, requires the services of a Java developer that is able to provide hi level design and development skills on complex and challenging applications, on a long term contract basis.
They have a large system that has moved into production and you will be providing development of new phases as well as support of those phases.
The development environment and requisite skills are below;
Technical Skills:
Java, ICEFACES, JSP, JSF, Ajax, Hibernate, Spring (overall J2EE technologies, session management, replication) Weblogic, Eclipse Oracle, SQL UML (Class diagrams, Sequence diagrams, deployment diagrams, use cases) (Able to create and read)
Strong communication skills, leadership skills, ability to function in a team, strong design/architecture skills
Brian Edmunds Managing Director briane@nexstaf.com www.nexstaf.com Nexstaf 5025 Orbitor Drive Suite 400 Mississauga, ON, L4W 4Y5
post.title: Java Developer - ONE YEAR - Mississauga
